titles.title: Federal Crop Insurance Fairness Act
A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to modify the provisions governing yield averages, to provide late planting coverage and prevented planting coverage, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2551-2552)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8597-8598)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8746-8747)

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 3/9/1993--Introduced. Federal Crop Insurance Fairness Act - Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act with respect to: (1) yield averages; (2) late planting coverage; (3) prevented planting coverage; and (4) de minimis yield penalties.
